word:
Those who have really tasted the sweets of redeeming love will not, cannot, rest until all with 
                                                                           205
whom they associate are made acquainted with the plan of salvation. The young should inquire, "Lord, what wilt Thou have me to do? How can I honor and glorify Thy name upon the earth?" Souls are perishing all around us, and yet what burden do the youth bear to win souls to Christ?
